name: Kai's Sandbox
description:
Sandbox Games are fun right?

Yeah. I Know.

Have you ever wanted a Low-Resource Sandbox Game Which Gets Updated Every DAY and Has a workshop For Users IN DISCORD So they can submit their Creations & Works?

Want no further.

NO MATTER WHAT DEVICE YOU'RE ON 

THE GAME'S STILL GOING TO HAVE SUPPORT SOME HOW!

GET THE GAME NOW ON

- LINUX
- MAC
- WINDOWS
- ANDROID
- IOS

This Game Is a High Definition Sandbox Simulator Game Featuring Many Different NPCs, Thousands of Console Commands, And MORE!

Join the Server for a Workshop, Beta testing, And Much More https://discord.gg/cThTsGQs

THE FEATURES ARE (From the Beta Releases)

- Discord Rich Presence For Any Device! Show your Friends What you're Playing Or Doing!

- Multiplayer Servers! Play with your friends!

- Custom Addons! Download User-Created Addons For yourself And Enjoy Playing With thousands of User-Created Features!!

- Smooth Gameplay! This Game Runs On Mostly EVERY Graphics Card Therefore ANYBODY Can Play!

- New Features Every Day! This Game Constantly Gets Updated

- Itch Auto Updates! Get Automatic Updates When you get the THIS EDIT!

If you would like to support game development, Donate 1$ Or More to Get The Beta Build for your OS!

If you've donated Before in the background, DM Me On Discord on @! timeout#5000

(INSTALL THE DEPENDENCIES PACK IF ON WINDOWS OR LINUX)
